name: ChestCTAngiogram
title: Chest CT Angiogram
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represent computer assisted diagnostic medical imaging test concepts. These terms may be used when reporting a result associated with Chest CT angiogram or may be used to represent the procedure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify Chest CT Angiogram scans performed or resulted on a patient or identify patients who have had Chest CT Angiogram scans performed or resulted.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes specific to Chest CT Angiogram tests.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes Chest CT Angiogram codes that are precoordinated with body sites other than the chest.)
